block.name: search_sobjects_soql
block.title: Search Opportunity Field Histories using SOQL query WHERE clause
block.description: Search Opportunity Field Histories using SOQL query WHERE clause in Salesforce

input.query: OpportunityId= '#{_('data.salesforce.92d439ad.Opportunity__c')}' and Field ='StageName' order by CreatedDate DESC
input.field_list:
Id
CreatedById
CreatedDate
Field
OldValue
NewValue

block.name: upload_file

extended_input_schema.name: region
extended_input_schema.label: Region
extended_input_schema.hint: Go to Bucket>Properties>Static website hosting to find your region in the 'Endpoint' URL, e.g. us-west-2

extended_input_schema.name: object_name
extended_input_schema.label: Object name
extended_input_schema.hint: Exact, case sensitive name of the object/file

extended_input_schema.name: accelerate
extended_input_schema.label: Use accelerated endpoint
extended_input_schema.hint: Default is false. Enter true to use accelerated endpoint. Go to Bucket>Properties>Transfer acceleration to check if accelerated endpoint is enabled

extended_input_schema.name: content_type
extended_input_schema.label: Content-Type metadata
extended_input_schema.hint: The Content-Type metadata to be attached to the file when uploading. Default is "multipart/form-data".

extended_input_schema.name: canned_permission

extended_input_schema.hint: Learn more about canned ACL here.

properties.placeholder: Email, user ID or group URI
